channel.title: iPod JailBreak - is it really worth it?
channel.description:
Is it worth Jailbreaking my ipod touch, I mean i want to be able to do things most ipods cant liek host servers, but ive heard it can damange the ipod itself and cause it to completely F**k up so to speak..
please help.

item.title: iPod JailBreak - is it really worth it?
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

iPod touch runs on UNIX, and by default the user is “jailed” into their home directory, which does not allow them to access or modify system files, and run unsigned code. However “jailbreaking” removes this limitation, allowing the execution of unsigned code, amongst other things. Note that you must be very careful not to interrupt the process, as this may leave you with a bricked iPod.

Read full topic
item.source: iPod JailBreak - is it really worth it?

item.title: iPod JailBreak - is it really worth it?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:38, topic:335288”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=431684.msg3170319#msg3170319 date=1270382451]

It’s not that amazing as it’s put out to be…

Better than normal. xD
[/quote]Exactly. But I mean people act like it’s incredible. Half of the themes on here are shit.[/quote]
I don’t do it for the themes. Once you jailbreak, you can get into the files of your device and mod a lotta apps.

Read full topic

item.title: iPod JailBreak - is it really worth it?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

I thought blackra1n was for the 3.1+?

Why are you using it on a 2.x… Just download the 3.1.2 firmware from somewhere, install that using iTunes (if you don’t know how then don’t even bother jailbreaking), and then use blackra1n.

Read full topic

item.title: iPod JailBreak - is it really worth it?
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Tell me downloading music straight onto your iTouch without needing iTunes isn’t worth it. You can also download any video off of the internet if you download dTunes from Cydia. Literally, any video.

Read full topic
item.source: iPod JailBreak - is it really worth it?

item.title: iPod JailBreak - is it really worth it?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:25, topic:335288”][quote author=Stupit link=topic=431684.msg3168781#msg3168781 date=1270252088]

sorry i gotta ask, what is jailbreaking?

Installing software on your ipod to get free apps and music.
[/quote]Not exactly.

Jailbreaking means you will change your software so you can get apps you normally can’t. The jailbreak software includes Cydia, which is essentially the “App Store” for apps that you can only get from jailbreaking. Such apps include emulators for GBA, SNES, Gameboy Color, NES, etc. Also, you can get different themes for your iPod, different app pictures, different sounds for locking/unlocking, and much more.[/quote]
I get my iTouch games off the Internet; cracked .ipa files, etc.

@Topic: Definitely jailbreak it with blackra1n.

Read full topic
